query: SELECT INDEX_NAME, COLUMN_NAME, NON_UNIQUE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.STATISTICS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'lesson_progress' ORDER BY INDEX_NAME, SEQ_IN_INDEX;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user cYPAHDVF1MZtM6S.6044338ada58 --database cwh3JmcrqYgAZTUAinEMzM --execute SELECT INDEX_NAME, COLUMN_NAME, NON_UNIQUE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.STATISTICS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'lesson_progress' ORDER BY INDEX_NAME, SEQ_IN_INDEX;
stdout:
INDEX_NAME	COLUMN_NAME	NON_UNIQUE
PRIMARY	id	0
idx_user_course	userId	1
idx_user_course	courseId	1
idx_user_module	userId	1
idx_user_module	moduleId	1
unique_user_lesson	userId	0
unique_user_lesson	lessonId	0
